Should be fixable. Letâ€™s take a look. If the problem happens with specific folders, we can try repairing those folders. To repair the affected folder(s) follow these steps:

  • Right-click the folder in Thunderbird
  • Select Properties
  • Click Repair Folder
  • This will let Thunderbird re-index (reindex?) and re-download the messages for that folder

Hopefully that wil fix the issue.
